outputs.output_descr: The overall objective of the action is the introduction of European standards of integrated border management at the Ninotsminda-Bavra Border Crossing Point on the with the ultimate goal to facilitate trade and transit and enhance the movement of people across the border.

project_descr: Enhancement of the border management capabilities at Bavra-Ninotsminda BCPs between Armenia and Georgia
project_title: Enhancement of the border management capabilities
